Text:
FPS from TFU1 is about the same, don't expect huge FPS differences.

Performance on a Radeon HD 3200 is terrible as well. This game syncs every frame, which makes it basically slo-mo since it's not rendering a lot of frames to start with.
I can't apply the official 1.1 update patch. It says "Software not found". :(

'Software not found' issue solved - use the European and Australian version of the patch:

ftp://ftp.lucasarts.com/patches/pc/SWTFU2_PC_EFIGS_1.1_Update.exe from http://www.lucasarts.com/support/update/SWTFU2_1_1.html

Worked for me. Took a long time to figure that out. :O
Controls do not work at all in game. i can use the mouse and keyboard in the menus but in the game nothing happens. Please help. Thanks
